summary: Implements the fan integration for Home Assistant, defining the fan entity model, supported features, service schemas, and helper functions to manage fan power, speed, direction, and oscillation, as well as grouping all fan entities.
business_intent: Allow users to control and automate fan devices through Home Assistant by exposing standardized services for turning fans on/off, adjusting speed levels, changing rotation direction, and toggling oscillation, facilitating unified fan management within the smart home ecosystem.
